QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, okr_objectives.id odf_pk, okr_objectives.RALLY_OBJECT_ID as rally_object_id, okr_objectives.CODE as code, okr_objectives.RALLY_FORMAT_ID as rally_format_id, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, okr_objectives.SCHEDULE_TARGET as schedule_target, okr_objectives.DESCRIPTION as description, okr_objectives.SOURCE as source, okr_objectives.TYPE as type, 'okr_objective' as odf_obj_type, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, OKR_OBJECTIVES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, okr_objectives.SCHEDULE_START as schedule_start, okr_objectives.OWNER as owner, okr_objectives.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, okr_objectives.INTEGRATION_MAPPINGS as integration_mappings, (NVL((SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 from NMC_CONVERSATIONS TC WHERE TC.RESOURCE_NAME='okr_objective' AND TC.RESOURCE_ID = okr_objectives.id)), 0)) as has_conversations, okr_objectives.LAST_SYNC_MSG as last_sync_msg, okr_objectives.LAST_SYNC_STATUS as last_sync_status, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, okr_objectives.ODF_BLUEPRINT_ID as odf_blueprint_id, okr_objectives.CONFIDENCE_SCORE as confidence_score, okr_objectives.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, NVL( okr_objectives.odf_blueprint_id, (select id from odf_blueprints b where b.type = NLS_UPPER('okr_objective') and b.is_default = 1 ) ) as odf_blp_active_id, (SELECT AVG(case when (KR.TARGET_VALUE - KR.START_VALUE) = 0 then 0 else (KR.CURRENT_VALUE - KR.START_VALUE)/(1.0*(KR.TARGET_VALUE - KR.START_VALUE)) end) from OKR_KEY_RESULTS KR WHERE KR.OBJECTIVE_ID = OKR_OBJECTIVES.ID) as progress, okr_objectives.OBJECTIVE_STATE as objective_state, OKR_OBJECTIVES.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_okr_objective.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from okr_objectives okr_objectives JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=okr_objectives.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=okr_objectives.last_updated_by JOIN odf_ca_okr_objective odf_ca_okr_objective ON odf_ca_okr_objective.id=okr_objectives.id where 1 = 1
